name: Cow

trait.name: Charge
text: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description:
There are many kinds of cattle, from common oxen to more unusual, magical variants.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 207, Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak
